properties.entry: INSERT INTO TBL_CHR_INFO ( CHR_CODE, USER_NO, CHR_NAME, CHR_HP, CHR_MP , CHR_EXP, CHR_LEVEL, CHR_GOLD, MAX_HP, MAX_MP , MAX_EXP, CHR_ATT, CHR_DEF, EQUIP_TITLE, EQUIP_WEAPON , EQUIP_ARMOR ) VALUES ( SEQ_CHR_CODE.NEXTVAL, SEQ_USER_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, 100, 100 , 0, 1, 0, 100, 100 , 100, 10, 10, NULL, '단검' , '갑옷' )
